click_gui.name: gui
desc: BARTENDER GUI PREFERENCES

contents.title: tot count
desc: DISPLAY TOTEM COUNT NEXT TO THE OFFHAND GUI

contents.title: numbers
desc: DISPLAY ACCURATE HP AND FOOD LEVELS

contents.title: theme
desc: GUI COLOR THEMES

contents.title: target list
desc: SHOW LIST OF POTENTIAL TARGETS
THIS CAN BE USED TO COMMAND YOUR BODYGUARDS

contents.title: AP overlay
desc: HIDE VANILLA ARMOR OVERLAY

contents.title: HP overlay
desc: HIDE VANILLA HEALTH OVERLAY WHEN FULL HEALTH

contents.title: keybinds
desc: TOGGLE BARTENDER KEYBINDS IN PAUSE MENU

contents.title: group
desc: TOGGLE INGAME GROUP OVERLAY

contents.title: draw player
desc: TOGGLE CLICKGUI PLAYER ENTITY

contents.title: dimmed
desc: TOGGLE CLICKGUI BACKGROUND COLOR

contents.title: tooltips
desc: TOGGLE CLICKGUI TOOLTIPS

contents.title: watermark
desc: CHOOSE WHERE YOU WANT TO DISPLAY
THE BARTENDER WATERMARK OR HIDE IT COMPLETELY

contents.title: reset layout
desc: RESET CLICKGUI LAYOUT

click_gui.name: particles
desc: COOL PARTICLE EFFECT FOR PLAYER ENTITY.
(ONLY VISIBLE FOR YOU)

contents.title: state
desc: CHOOSE WHEN PARTICLE EFFECT IS ON AND OFF

contents.title: lift
desc: Y COORDINATE TO SPAWN THE PARTICLES ON
(RELATIVE TO THE PLAYER)

contents.title: rate
desc: CHOOSE PARTICLE EMISSION RATE

contents.title: type
desc: CHOOSE PARTICLE TYPE

click_gui.name: bodyguard
desc: BARITONE BODYGUARD THAT CAN FLY
YOU NEED MULTIPLE ACCOUNTS TO USE THIS FEATURE

contents.title: state
desc: ON/OFF

contents.title: agro
desc: CHOOSE WHEN TO ATTACK A (POTENTIAL) ENEMY

contents.title: look
desc: FREE LOOK IS BETTER FOR FUNCTIONALITY,
LOCKED LOOK JUST LOOKS COOLER

contents.title: offset
desc: MAKE GUARDS WALK AROUND THE FOLLOW TARGET.
LOOKS COOL BUT IS NOT THAT GOOD FOR FUNCTIONALITY

contents.title: offset draw
desc: INTERVAL IN MILLIS FOR HOW OFTEN THE OFFSET SHOULD CHANGE

contents.title: entity RD
desc: SERVER'S ENTITY RENDER DISTANCE IN CHUNKS.
THIS IS IMPORTANT TO SET CORRECTLY SO YOUR BODYGUARDS STAY NEAR YOU.

contents.title: allow chat
desc: ALLOW THE BODYGUARD BOT TALK IN CHAT.

contents.title: P log
desc: PROTECTED LOG BEHAVIOR = WHAT TO DO IF PROTECTED DISCONNECTS

click_gui.name: flight
desc: FLIGHT RELATED SETTINGS FOR THE BODYGUARD

contents.title: hold landing
desc: WHEN ATTACKING A GROUND ENEMY FROM AIR,
GUARD TRIES TO STAY AIRBORNE UNTIL PROTECTED LANDS.
IF YOUR ELYTRA SPEED IS TOO HIGH, THE GUARD WILL MOST LIKELY LAND ANYWAY

contents.title: orbit
desc: HOVER ORBIT REPLACES BASIC HOVER BEHAVIOR

contents.title: clockwise
desc: HOVER ORBIT DIRECTION

contents.title: takeoff timer
desc: MILLIS DELAY BETWEEN SPACE BAR HITS WHEN ATTEMPTING TO TAKE OFF

contents.title: takeoff limit
desc: MILLIS TIME LIMIT TO GIVE UP TAKEOFF ATTEMPT

contents.title: auto takeoff
desc: AUTOMATIC TAKEOFF IF PROTECTED IS ELYTRA FLYING
THIS ONLY WORKS IF THE HOSTILE LIST IS EMPTY
ON COMBAT SITUATION, TRIGGER TAKEOFF MANUALLY.

click_gui.name: group
desc: GROUP CONTROLS FOR THE BODYGUARDS

contents.title: here
desc: SEND /tpahere FOR ALL MEMBERS OF YOUR GROUP
THERE IS ABOUT 10 SEC DELAY BETWEEN EACH REQUEST

contents.title: stand here
desc: COMMAND ALL GROUP MEMBERS TO STAND ON THE SPOT YOU ARE ON

contents.title: tpaccept
desc: SELECT WHAT TPA REQUESTS SHOULD BE AUTO ACCEPTED
(ONLY WORKS FOR PLAYERS IN THE GROUP)

contents.title: friends
desc: SELECT THE PLAYERS BARTENDER SHOULD NOT CONSIDER AS AN ENEMY

contents.title: leave group
desc: LOCALLY REMOVE ALL PLAYERS FROM YOUR GROUP

contents.title: obby grief
desc: TELL GROUP MEMBERS TO START MINING NEARBY OBSIDIAN
THIS WILL GO ON FOREVER IF YOU DON'T END IT WITH THE 'end tasks' COMMAND

contents.title: ground level
desc: DIG YOUR WAY OUT OF THE CAVE AND
AND TELL GROUP MEMBERS TO DO THE SAME

contents.title: end tasks
desc: KILL ALL RUNNING TASKS ON ALL ACCOUNTS AND START THE DEFAULTS

contents.title: chorus
desc: COMMAND ALL PLAYERS IN THE GROUP TO EAT A CHORUS FRUIT.
- AUTO EAT MUST BE ENABLED
- THE CHORUS FRUIT MUST BE IN YOUR HOTBAR

contents.title: takeoff
desc: MAKE ALL YOUR ALTS TO ATTEMPT TAKEOFF.
THIS FAILS PRETTY OFTEN SO YOU NEED TO TRY IT MANY TIMES.
USING JESUS HACKS ON WATER MAKES TAKEOFF MUCH EASIER!

contents.title: retreat
desc: CLEAR ENEMIES LIST (STOP FIGHTING)

click_gui.name: auto eat
desc: AUTOMATICALLY EAT WHEN HUNGRY, SYNCED WITH OTHER BARTENDER MODULES

contents.title: state
desc: ON/OFF

contents.title: fire resistance
desc: EAT GAPPLE IF YOU ARE BURNING

contents.title: health
desc: EAT WHEN HP GOES BELOW THIS VALUE

contents.title: hunger
desc: EAT WHEN HUNGER GOES BELOW THIS VALUE

click_gui.name: aura
desc: AUTO HIT ENTITIES YOU CAN REACH

contents.title: state
desc: AUTO=CONTROLLED BY BODYGUARD ENEMY LIST
ON=HIT ANY ENTITY EXCEPT GROUP MEMBERS AND FRIENDS
OFF=ALWAYS OFF

contents.title: hit crystals
desc: TURN ON TO HIT END CRYSTALS IN RANGE
IF YOU ENABLE THIS, AURA ONLY ATTACKS PLAYERS MARKED AS HOSTILE

contents.title: prio
desc: SELECT WHAT ENTITY SHOULD BE PRIORITY IF THERE ARE MANY TO CHOOSE FROM

contents.title: reach
desc: AURA REACH DISTANCE

contents.title: mobs
desc: SELECT WHAT MOBS SHOULD BE ATTACKED

contents.title: D type
desc: SELECT DELAY TYPE

contents.title: D millis
desc: DELAY MILLISECONDS

contents.title: RD millis
desc: RANDOM VALUE TO BE ADDED TO THE DELAY
VALUE WILL BE BETWEEN 0 AND THE VALUE YOU SELECT

contents.title: D ticks
desc: DELAY TICKS

click_gui.name: click command
desc: YOU CAN ACCESS THE BARTENDER KEYBINDS THROUGH
THIS GUI PANEL AS WELL. NOTE THAT ONLY SERVER COMMANDS ARE SUPPORTED!
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND
EXECUTE THIS COMMAND
YOU CAN EDIT THE BINDED COMMANDS WITH THE /bind COMMAND

click_gui.name: safe totem
desc: AUTOTOTEM FOR 32K PVP & STACKED TOTS

contents.title: state
desc: ON/OFF

contents.title: reminder
desc: SAFETY REMINDER TEXT IN PAUSE MENU

contents.title: stacksize
desc: MAX STACK SIZE FOR TOTS

contents.title: swap at
desc: WHEN OFFHAND TOTEM STACK'S COUNT GOES BELOW THIS VALUE,
-> SWAP TO A NEW STACK

contents.title: interval
desc: MILLISECONDS ON HOW RAPIDLY SWAP IS ALLOWED

contents.title: NDB
desc: NEAR DEATH BEHAVIOR (NDB)
APPLIED WHEN TOTAL TOTEM COUNT GOES UNDER ND COUNT

contents.title: NDB count
desc: NEAR DEATH BEHAVIOR IS APPLIED ONCE
TOTEM COUNT GOES BELOW THIS VALUE

click_gui.name: auto build
desc: USES BARITONE TO BUILD SIMPLE SCHEMATICS

contents.title: stop
desc: STOP BUILDER PROCESS

contents.title: current
desc: STARTS BUILDING THE CURRENTLY LOADED SCHEMATIC.
(REQUIRES SCHEMATICA TO WORK)

contents.title: mapart mode
desc: MAPART MODE MAKES BARITONE ONLY CARE
ABOUT THE TOP BLOCK OF EACH COLUMN

contents.title: clear chunk
desc: DESTROY EVERY BLOCK IN THE CHUNK YOU ARE IN

contents.title: nether portal
desc: BUILD A NETHER PORTAL SCHEMATIC

contents.title: nomad hut
desc: BUILD DRUNK'S NOMAD HUT SCHEMATIC FROM OBSIDIAN

contents.title: youtube ad
desc: BUILD DRUNK'S YOUTUBE AD SCHEMATIC FROM OBSIDIAN AND DIRT

contents.title: bartender ad
desc: BUILD BARTENDER AD SCHEMATIC FROM OBSIDIAN AND DIRT

contents.title: tombstone
desc: BUILD TOMBSTONE SCHEMATIC FROM OBSIDIAN

contents.title: swastika
desc: BUILD SWASTIKA SCHEMATIC FROM OBSIDIAN

click_gui.name: chat
desc: CHAT RELATED SETTINGS

contents.title: moo check
desc: WHEN TURNED ON, THIS PREVENTS YOU FROM EXECUTING
MOOOMOOO COMMANDS WHEN THE BOT IS OFFLINE

contents.title: AFK reply
desc: WHEN TURNED ON, ANYONE OUTSIDE YOU GROUP
WHISPERING YOU WILL RECEIVE RESPONSE: 'I'm currently afk'

contents.title: help
desc: ALLOW PLAYERS TO USE THE HELP COMMAND

contents.title: drinks
desc: ALLOW PLAYERS TO ORDER DRINKS USING THE ORDER COMMAND

contents.title: drinks ad
desc: SEND CHAT MESSAGE ADVERTISING THE DRINKS COMMAND

contents.title: chatfix
desc: WRITE SOMETHING TO THE END OF EACH CHAT MESSAGE YOU SEND
USE /chatfix TO EDIT

contents.title: party tpa
desc: WHEN THIS IS ON, EVERY TPA REQUEST IS AUTOMATICALLY ACCEPTED

contents.title: party ad
desc: SEND CHAT MESSAGE ADVERTISING THE PARTY IN PUBLIC CHAT

contents.title: pornhub
desc: WHEN THIS IS ON, PLAYERS CAN EXECUTE PORNHUB SEARCHES ON YOU

contents.title: pornhub ad
desc: SEND CHAT MESSAGE ADVERTISING THE PORNHUB SEARCH

click_gui.name: base finder
desc: AFK BASE HUNTING BOT

contents.title: state
desc: OF/OFF

contents.title: travel
desc: TRAVEL DIRECTION.
WHEN ORBIT IS SELECTED, BOT ORBITS AROUND SPAWN
STARTING FROM THE ACTIVATION LOCATION.
USE CUSTOM TO TRAVEL TO ANY GIVEN COORDINATES

contents.title: save log
desc: MAKE BOT TO WRITE A TXT REPORT OF THE HUNTING SESSION

contents.title: screenshot
desc: TAKE SCREENSHOT OF THE INTERESTING CHUNKS

contents.title: anti encounter
desc: DISCONNECT IF A NON GROUP PLAYER ENTERS RENDER DISTANCE

contents.title: avoid spawn
desc: DISCONNECT IF ENTERING AREA 20K FROM SPAWN

contents.title: orbit density
desc: HOW MANY BLOCKS THERE SHOULD BE BETWEEN EACH ORBIT LEVEL

contents.title: flight level
desc: Y COORDINATE OF TRAVEL

contents.title: disconnect
desc: CHOOSE WHEN TO DISCONNECT

contents.title: pause
desc: CHOOSE WHEN TO PAUSE

contents.title: pause/continue
desc: PAUSE/CONTINUE HUNT
